definitions.definition: not connected with or relevant to something.
examples: beside the point, immaterial, not pertinent, not germane, off the subject, unconnected, unrelated, peripheral, extraneous, inapposite, inapplicable; Moreunimportant, inconsequential, insignificant, trivial; off-topic; formalimpertinent "the judge ruled that the victim's use of drugs was irrelevant"Moreunimportant, inconsequential, insignificant, trivial; off-topic; impertinent the judge ruled that the victim's use of drugs was irrelevant
